channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump sees Lithium Americas as a vital investment. Here’s why Wall Street agrees.
item.description: The Trump administration is taking a stake in Lithium Americas as part of its strategy to invest in industries seen as vital for national security.

item.title: ‘The gold market is rarely wrong.’ Why stocks and bitcoin are in a danger zone.
item.description: S&P 500 at 5,700? Bitcoin at $80,000? Trader Jeffrey Bierman says the market is running on fumes and “FOMO.”

item.title: Big investors are afraid of the stock market, and the S&P 500’s path to 7,000 just got easier.

item.title: Two Social Security problems that seem almost impossible to fix
item.description: The “Social Security squeeze” is coming for your benefits. Can the program’s most existential problems be solved?

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
